dcterms:description: The mKETTS dataset consists of recordings of a 30-year-old male pronouncing 3,000 sentences in seven different emotions (neutral, happiness, sadness, anger, fear, surprise, and disgust), totaling 21,000 utterances. All recordings were conducted in a silent studio at a 44.1 kHz sampling rate, with a total duration of 29.2 hours after trimming silence.
dcterms:title: Male Korean Emotional Text-to-Speech (mKETTS) dataset
